alert.note: Alert for Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:53PM EDT until June 08 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HOCKING AND EASTERN ROSS COUNTIES... At 752 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chillicothe, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Kingston, North Folk Village, Londonderry, Laurelville, Adelphi, Andersonville, Mooresville, South Bloomingville, Summithill, Knockemstiff, Richmond Dale, Massieville, Hallsville, Scioto Trail State Park and Bourneville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
